divs: Sighting DetailsAbout 3 years ago I was setting up my 10inch f4.5 newtonian telescope to a astro-vid video camera, I was using the moon to make adjustments while recording. I noticed nothing on the screen at the time because I was moving back and forth between monitor and scope. But on playback I noticed something move across the monitor which at first I thought was a bug. But it was recorded and I played it many times trying to figure out what it was. After checking around with friends they told me it was not the space shuttle. It had a sort of triangle shape and seemed to be doing barrel rolls. I was told that the shuttle doesen't do barrel rolls. I have the vhs tape in my possession. No one else seemed to be interested in it so it sat. If you want to see video send me an address and I will.
